thread.title: Ghanaian man claims Jesus created heaven 12,000 years ago, world ends in 3 years
thread.title_full: Ghanaian man claims Jesus created heaven 12,000 years ago, world ends in 3 years

author: Muhammed Hammed
title: Ghanaian man claims Jesus created heaven 12,000 years ago, world ends in 3 years
text:
Viral Gist
Ghanaian man claims Jesus created heaven 12,000 years ago, world ends in 3 years
A
Ghanaian man has sparked reactions online with his claim that the world is currently operating on the 1997 calendar.
He also asserted that Jesus created heaven and earth 12,000 years ago and that the world will come to an end in just three years.
This revelation was captured in a viral video circulating on TikTok, where he confidently stated that the calendar in use today was previously used in 1997.
According to him, â€œThis year is actually 1997, not 2025. The foreigners know this. Heaven and earth were created 12,000 years ago. This world has existed for that long.â€
Speaking on the supposed impending end of the world, he added, â€œThere are only three years left before the world ends. In three years, Jesus will return.â€
His claims have stirred mixed reactions, with many viewers flooding the comment section to share their thoughts.
See some reactions below:
